maple: A005185:= proc(n) option remember; procname(n-procname(n-1)) +procname(n-procname(n-2)) end proc:
A004001:= proc(n) option remember; procname(procname(n-1)) +procname(n-procname(n-1)) end proc:
mathematica: a[n_] := a[n] = If[n <= 2, 1, a[a[n - 1]] + a[n - a[n - 1]]]; b[1] = b[2] = 1; b[n_] := b[n] = b[n - b[n - 1]] + b[n - b[n - 2]]; Table[(-1)^n*(a@ n - b@ n), {n, 87}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Apr 02 2017, after _Robert G. Wilson v_ at A004001 *)
